grails-app.taglib.storm
Class GeneralTagLib

java.lang.Object
  grails-app.taglib.storm.GeneralTagLib

class GeneralTagLib

The purpose of this tag library is to give access to certain common tags used in the STORM application.

  • feed: imports a feed with title, link, date, image and content
  • niceDate: displays a nice date, dependent on current locale
  • replaceHTML: removes html-comments from strings
author:
Olaf Roeder, Gerrit, Edzard

Property Summary
def feed

Imports a feed with titel, link, date, image and content usage in *.gsp: <g:feed url="http://example.com/rss" max="3"/>
def niceDate

Displays a nice date, dependent on current locale, usage: <g:niceDate date="${classInstance.date}" /> where classInstance is a class containing a date variable.

def replaceHTML

Property Detail

feed

def feed
Imports a feed with titel, link, date, image and content usage in *.gsp: <g:feed url="http://example.com/rss" max="3"/>
param:
url: Url for the feed
param:
max: Maximum number of feeds shown
@author: Gerrit

niceDate

def niceDate
Displays a nice date, dependent on current locale, usage: <g:niceDate date="${classInstance.date}" /> where classInstance is a class containing a date variable. Currently only distinguishes between english and german.
param:
date="${classInstance.date}" where classInstance is a class containing a date variable
return:
String a formatted date string
